articles.title: Stephen Lawrence's brother investigates impact of George Floyd's murder - and why he disagrees with some of Black Lives Matter 'rhetoric' - Sky News

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Will smart toilets soon be able to track our health through our stool? - The Star Online
articles.description: American researchers have developed an artificial intelligence capable of analysing stools when they arrive in the pipes. This tool would enable better follow-up of patients suffering from intestinal disorders.

articles.title: Chile Eyes 'Mobility Pass' for Population With Two Covid Shots - BNN
articles.description: Chile will grant citizens who are fully vaccinated against coronavirus greater freedom in the form of a “mobility pass,” as the South American nation oversees one of the world’s fastest inoculation drives.

articles.title: U.S. Covid cases hit lowest level since June as nation looks toward Memorial Day, summer travel - CNBC
articles.description: The declining infection counts comes as many Americans plan to travel, spend days at the beach and gather with friends and family over the summer.
articles.content:
Covid cases in the U.S. have dropped to their lowest level since June as the nation prepares for Memorial Day weekend, the unofficial start of the summer travel season.
